00002 #include "Util.h"

00006 #define LINELEN 4096
00007 #define GREETING_STRING "HELLO I'M LEODAQGL"
00008 #define PLUGIN_START_STRING "PLUGIN START" 
00009 #define PLUGIN_END_STRING   "PLUGIN END"
00010 #define PLUGIN_PARAMS_STRING "PLUGIN PARAMS"
00011 #define PLUGIN_PARAMS_END_STRING "END PLUGIN PARAMS"
00012 #define OK_STRING "OK"

00019     static QString socketErrorToString(QAbstractSocket::SocketError e) {
00020         switch (e) {
00021         case QAbstractSocket::ConnectionRefusedError: 
00022             return "The connection was refused by the peer (or timed out).";
00023         case QAbstractSocket::RemoteHostClosedError:
00024             return "The remote host closed the connection.";
00025         case QAbstractSocket::HostNotFoundError:
00026             return "The host address was not found.";
00027         case QAbstractSocket::SocketAccessError:
00028             return "The socket operation failed because the application lacked the required privileges.";
00029         case QAbstractSocket::SocketResourceError:
00030             return "The local system ran out of resources (e.g., too many sockets).";
00031         case QAbstractSocket::SocketTimeoutError:
00032             return "The socket operation timed out.";
00033         case QAbstractSocket::DatagramTooLargeError:
00034             return "The datagram was larger than the operating system's limit.";
00035         case QAbstractSocket::AddressInUseError:
00036             return "The address specified to bind() is already in use and was set to be exclusive.";
00037         case QAbstractSocket::SocketAddressNotAvailableError:
00038             return "The address specified to bind() does not belong to the host.";
00039         case QAbstractSocket::UnsupportedSocketOperationError:
00040             return "The requested socket operation is not supported by the local operating system (e.g., lack of IPv6 support).";
00041         case QAbstractSocket::ProxyAuthenticationRequiredError:
00042             return "The socket is using a proxy, and the proxy requires authentication.";
00043         default:
00044             return "An unidentified error occurred.";
00045         }
00046         return QString::null; // not reached
00047     }

00052     void setSockContextName(const QString & n) { 
00053         //if (!sockContextMut) sockContextMut = new QMutex;
00054         //QMutexLocker l(sockContextMut);
00055         sockContextName_ = n; 
00056     }
00057     QString sockContextName() {
00058         //if (!sockContextMut) sockContextMut = new QMutex;
00059         //QMutexLocker l(sockContextMut);
00060         return sockContextName_;
00061     }
00062     
00063     bool sockSend(QTcpSocket & sock, const QString & msg, int timeout_msecs,
00064                   QString * errStr_out = 0)
00065     {
00066         sock.write(msg.toUtf8());
00067         if (sock.bytesToWrite() && !sock.waitForBytesWritten(timeout_msecs)) {
00068             QString estr = socketErrorToString(sock.error());
00069             if (errStr_out) *errStr_out = estr;
00070             Error() << sockContextName()  << " failed write with socket error: " << estr;
00071             return false;
00072         }        
00073         //Debug() << "notify_write: " << msg;
00074         return true;
00075     }
00076 
00077     QString sockReadLine(QTcpSocket & sock, int timeout_msecs, QString * errStr_out = 0) 
00078     {
00079         // read greeting from server        
00080         for (int ct = 0; !sock.canReadLine(); ++ct) {
00081             if (!sock.waitForReadyRead(timeout_msecs) || ct >= 3) {
00082                 Error() << sockContextName() << " failed because timed out on read from LeoDAQGL program.";
00083                 if (errStr_out) *errStr_out = "Failed to read line.";
00084                 return QString::null;
00085             }
00086         }
00087         QString line = sock.readLine(LINELEN);
00088         line = line.trimmed();
00089         //Debug() << "notify_read: " << line;
00090         return line;
00091     }
00092 
00093     static bool doNotify (bool isStart,          
00094                           const QString & pname, 
00095                           const QMap<QString, QVariant>  &pparms,
00096                           QString *errStr_out,
00097                           const QString & host,
00098                           unsigned short port, 
00099                           int timeout_msecs)
00100     {
00101         Debug() << "Notifying LeoDAQGL of `" << pname << "' " << (isStart ? "start" : "end") << "...";
00102         setSockContextName("Notify LeoDAQGL");
00103         QTcpSocket sock;
00104 
00105         sock.connectToHost(host, port);
00106         if (!sock.waitForConnected(timeout_msecs) || !sock.isValid()) {
00107             QString estr = socketErrorToString(sock.error());
00108             if (errStr_out) *errStr_out = estr;            
00109             QString logoutput = sockContextName() + " failed to notify; " + estr;
00110             if (sock.error() == QAbstractSocket::ConnectionRefusedError) 
00111                 Debug() << logoutput;
00112             else
00113                 Error() << logoutput;
00114             return false;
00115         }
00116         
00117         QString line = sockReadLine(sock, timeout_msecs, errStr_out);
00118         if (line.isNull()) return false;
00119         if (!sockSend(sock, QString(isStart ? PLUGIN_START_STRING : PLUGIN_END_STRING) + " " + pname.trimmed() + "\n", timeout_msecs, errStr_out)) return false;
00120         if (!sockSend(sock, QString(PLUGIN_PARAMS_STRING) + "\n", timeout_msecs, errStr_out)) return false;
00121         for (QMap<QString, QVariant> ::const_iterator it = pparms.begin();
00122              it != pparms.end();
00123              ++it) {
00124             if (!sockSend(sock, QString("%1 = %2\n").arg(it.key()).arg(it.value().toString()), timeout_msecs, errStr_out)) return false;
00125         }
00126         if (!sockSend(sock, QString("%1\n").arg(PLUGIN_PARAMS_END_STRING), timeout_msecs, errStr_out)) return false;
00127         line = sockReadLine(sock, timeout_msecs, errStr_out);
00128         if (line.isNull()) return false;
00129         if (!line.startsWith(OK_STRING)) {
00130             QString estr = QString("Did not read OK from LeoDAQGL after sending plugin ") + (isStart ? "start" : "end") + " msg!";
00131             if (errStr_out) *errStr_out = estr;
00132             Error() << "Notify LeoDAQGL failed: " << estr;
00133             return false;
00134         }
00135         Debug() << "LeoDAQGL notified of plugin `" << pname << "' " << (isStart ? "start" : "end") << " via socket!";
00136         return true;
00137     }

00139     bool Notify_PluginStart( const QString & pname, 
00140                              const QMap<QString, QVariant>  &pparms,
00141                              QString *errStr_out,
00142                              const QString & host,
00143                              unsigned short port, 
00144                              int timeout_msecs)
00145     {
00146         return doNotify(true, pname, pparms, errStr_out, host, port, timeout_msecs);
00147     }
00148 
00149     bool Notify_PluginEnd  (const QString & pname, 
00150                             const QMap<QString, QVariant>  &pparms,
00151                             QString *errStr_out,
00152                             const QString & host,
00153                             unsigned short port, 
00154                             int timeout_msecs)
00155     {
00156         return doNotify(false, pname, pparms, errStr_out, host, port, timeout_msecs);
00157     }

00159     void NotifyServer::processConnection(QTcpSocket & sock)
00160     {
00161         QString line;
00162         setSockContextName("NotifyServerThread");
00163         line = QString(GREETING_STRING) + "\n";
00164         bool isStart = false;
00165 
00166         if (!sockSend(sock, line, timeout_msecs)) return;
00167         if ((line = sockReadLine(sock, timeout_msecs)).isNull()) return;
00168         if (!(isStart = line.startsWith(PLUGIN_START_STRING)) && !line.startsWith(PLUGIN_END_STRING)) {
00169             Error() << sockContextName() << " parse error expected: {" << PLUGIN_START_STRING << "|" << PLUGIN_END_STRING << "} got: " << line;
00170             return;
00171         }
00172         if (isStart)
00173             line = line.mid(QString(PLUGIN_START_STRING).length());
00174         else
00175             line = line.mid(QString(PLUGIN_END_STRING).length());
00176         line = line.trimmed();
00177         QString pluginName = line;
00178         if ((line = sockReadLine(sock, timeout_msecs)).isNull()) return;
00179         if (!line.startsWith(PLUGIN_PARAMS_STRING)) {
00180             Error() << sockContextName() << " parse error expected: " << PLUGIN_PARAMS_STRING << "got: " << line;
00181             return;
00182         }
00183         QMap<QString, QVariant>  params;
00184         while (  !(line = sockReadLine(sock, timeout_msecs)).startsWith(PLUGIN_PARAMS_END_STRING)) {
00185             QStringList l = line.trimmed().split("=");
00186             if (l.count() < 2) { Debug() << "skipping params line that does not contain '=': " << line; continue; }
00187             QString n = l.front().trimmed();
00188             l.pop_front();
00189             QString v = l.join("=").trimmed();
00190             params[n] = v;
00191         }
00192         line = QString(OK_STRING) + "\n";
00193         if (!sockSend(sock, line, timeout_msecs)) return;
00194         emitGotPluginNotification(isStart, pluginName, params);
00195         //Log() << "Received plugin " << (isStart ? "start" : "end") << " notificaton from StimGL for plugin " << pluginName;
00196     }
00197  
00198     void NotifyServer::gotNewConnection() 
00199     {
00200         QTcpSocket *sock = srv.nextPendingConnection();
00201         processConnection(*sock);
00202         sock->close();
00203         delete sock;
00204     }

00206     static bool mapMetaTypeRegistered = false;
00207 
00208     NotifyServer::NotifyServer(QObject *parent) 
00209         : QObject(parent)
00210     {
00211         if (!mapMetaTypeRegistered) {
00212             qRegisterMetaType<QMap<QString, QVariant> >();
00213             mapMetaTypeRegistered = true;
00214         }
00215         Connect(&srv, SIGNAL(newConnection()), this, SLOT(gotNewConnection()));
00216     }

00220     }

00223     bool NotifyServer::beginListening(const QString & iface, unsigned short port, int tout) {
00224         timeout_msecs = tout;        
00225         QHostAddress haddr;
00226         if (iface == "0.0.0.0") haddr = QHostAddress(QHostAddress::Any);
00227         else if (iface == "localhost" || iface == "127.0.0.1") haddr = QHostAddress(QHostAddress::LocalHost);
00228         else haddr = iface;
00229         if (!srv.listen(haddr, port)) {
00230             Error() << "NotifyServer could not listen: " << srv.errorString();
00231             return false;
00232         }
00233         Log() << "StimGL notification server listening on " << haddr.toString() << ":" << port;
00234         return true;
00235     }
00236 
00237     void NotifyServer::emitGotPluginNotification(bool isStart, const QString &p, const QMap<QString, QVariant>  &pp) {
00238         if (isStart)
00239             emit gotPluginStartNotification(p, pp);
00240         else
00241             emit gotPluginEndNotification(p, pp);
00242     }
